name: Lunar Cycles Unending
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Azhdaha, play this card on them. Attach Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization to Azhdaha, then create 1 Elemental Die for each Elemental Type your characters have.
(Deck must contain Azhdaha to add this card to it)
